    Ph.D student in Decision Sciences at INSEAD

    I am currently pursuing my doctorate in Decision Sciences at INSEAD, under the supervision of Enrico Diecidue and Ville Satop채채, with expected graduation in 2020-21.

    I work on individual decision making and forecasting with high-dimensional (probability) models. I value applications with societal upsides. I am currently working on urban crime and environmental decision making.


    On this website

    On this website, you can find news and resources related to my research, as well as an array of generic blogposts that, while often remaining related to my research, I hope can help you with your research or work. The latest additions to the site are listed below, for convenience.

    If you want to get in touch, do not hesitate to do so using the contact information in the left part of this page.
